original: Disallows Absolute Cognatic succession laws\n
translation: 不允许男女平等继承法\n

original: Allows Absolute Cognatic succession laws\n
translation: 允许男女平等继承法\n

original: Wants Seat on the Council
translation: 想要成为内阁成员

original: Request Council Support
translation: 要求内阁支持

original: Ask to Press Claims
translation: 要求索取宣称

original: If you think that §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is better suited for another job on the council you can exchange [Root.GetHerHis] current council job for another one.
translation: 如果你觉得§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!更胜任另一份内阁的工作，你可以把[Root.GetHerHis]现今工作与另一个人交换。

original: Is being affected by an active Realm Peace.
translation: 处于全境和平的影响

original: Is NOT being affected by an active Realm Peace.
translation: 不处于全境和平的影响

original: horsing around
translation: 胡闹

original: Too busy conquering the world and you're next:
translation: 忙于征服世界，而你就是下一个目标：

original: $LIEGE|Y$ has enforced peace.
translation: $LIEGE|Y$已执行强制和平。

original: $LIEGE|Y$ has not enforced peace.
translation: $LIEGE|Y$尚未执行强制和平。

original: $LIEGE|Y$ will enforce peace.
translation: $LIEGE|Y$将会强制和平。

original: $LIEGE|Y$ will not enforce peace.
translation: $LIEGE|Y$不会执行强制和平。

original: §RGoing against the will of The Council will be viewed as an act of tyranny!§!
translation: §R与内阁的意志相违背将会被视为一种暴君行为！§!

original: Ask to Join Factions
translation: 请求加入派系

original: Spend a §YFavor§! to force §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! to join your factions.
translation: 用一个§Y人情§!强迫§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!加入你的派系。

original: You can spend the §YFavor§! §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! owes you to have them join the factions you started.
translation: 你可以用§Y人情§!强迫§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!加入你所建立的派系。

original: \nTo return the favor you owe me, I request you join the factions I have started.
translation: \n为了偿还我的人情，我要求你加入我所建立的派系。

original: \nJoin my factions.
translation: \n加入我的派系

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! used a favor on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to force them to join all their factions.
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!用人情强迫§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!加入他们所有派系。

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ can join $FACTION|Y$
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$可以加入$FACTION|Y$

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ can join at least one of your factions
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$可以加入至少一个你的派系

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ has not been forbidden to join factions
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$已经不被禁止加入派系了

original: §YJoin Faction§!
translation: §Y加入派系§!

original: Is de facto liege
translation: 是事实领主

original: Can't leave faction because you were coerced into joining
translation: 不能离开派系因为你是被威逼加入的

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must not be married
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$必须是未婚

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must not be a close relative of $LIEGE|Y$
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$不能是$LIEGE|Y$的近亲

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must not have a Council position
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$不能拥有内阁职位

original: Hates their liege - §Y[GetTitledName]§!
translation: 痛恨他们的领主——§Y[GetTitledName]§!

original: Ask for Realm Peace
translation: 请求全境和平

original: Spend a §YFavor§! to ask your liege to enforce §YRealm Peace§!.
translation: 用一个§Y人情§!请求你的领主执行§Y全境和平§!。

original: You can spend the §YFavor§! §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! owes you to force them to start enforcing §YRealm Peace§!.
translation: 你可以用§Y人情§!强迫§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!执行§Y全境和平§!。

original: \nTo return the favor you owe me, I request you start enforcing peace through the realm.
translation: \n为了偿还我的人情，我要求你执行全境和平。

original: \nEnforce Realm Peace.
translation: \n执行全境和平

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! used a favor on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to force them to enforce the §YRealm Peace§!.
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!用人情强迫§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!执行§Y全境和平§!。

original: Demand Council Position
translation: 索要内阁职位

original: Spend a §YFavor§! to demand a §YCouncil§! position from your liege.
translation: 用一个§Y人情§!向你的领主索要一个§Y内阁§!职位。

original: You can spend the §YFavor§! §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! owes you to force them to give you a position on the §YCouncil§!.
translation: 你可以用§Y人情§!强迫§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!在§Y内阁§!中授予你职位。

original: \nTo return the favor you owe me, I request you give me my rightful position on your council.
translation: \n为了偿还我的人情，我要求你授予我一个应得的内阁职位。

original: \nIn return for the favor you owe me, give me a position on your council.
translation: \n作为你欠我人情的回报，授予我一个你内阁中的职位。

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! used a favor on §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to get the $POSITION|Y$ position$FIRED$
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!使用§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!欠的人情得到了$POSITION|Y$职位$FIRED$

original: , getting $FIRED|Y$ fired in the process.
translation: ，与此同时$FIRED|Y$被解雇。

original: Was forced to give a Council Position
translation: 被迫授予了内阁席位

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ must have §YCouncil§! positions that $ACTOR|Y$ can hold
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$必须有$ACTOR|Y$可以胜任的§Y内阁§!职位

original: $ACTOR|Y$ can be $POSITION|Y$ for $RECIPIENT|Y$
translation: $ACTOR|Y$可以担任$RECIPIENT|Y$的$POSITION|Y$

original: $ACTOR|Y$ must choose a §YCouncil§! Position to ask $RECIPIENT|Y$
translation: $ACTOR|Y$必须选择一个§Y内阁§!职位来请求$RECIPIENT|Y$

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] request to join the council as [Title.GetName], despite the favor owed.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]无视人情亏欠，拒绝了[From.GetTitledFirstName]在内阁中担任[Title.GetName]的请求。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] spent the favor [This.GetTitledFirstName] owed [From.GetObjectPronoun] to force the Realm Peace.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]用了[This.GetTitledFirstName]欠下的人情[From.GetObjectPronoun]强迫全境和平。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] request to force the realm peace, despite the favor owed.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]无视人情，拒绝了[From.GetTitledFirstName]强迫全境和平的请求。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] spent the favor [This.GetTitledFirstName] owed [From.GetObjectPronoun] to force [This.GetTitledFirstName] to join their Factions.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]用了[This.GetTitledFirstName]欠下的人情[From.GetObjectPronoun]强迫[This.GetTitledFirstName]加入他们的派系。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] to join [Actor.GetTitledFirstName]'s factions, despite the favor owed.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]无视人情亏欠，拒绝了[From.GetTitledFirstName]加入[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]的派系。

original: $ACTOR|Y$ is leading at least one §YFaction§!
translation: $ACTOR|Y$正在领导至少一个§Y派系§!

original: §YRealm Peace§! can be enforced
translation: 可以执行§Y全境和平§!

original: This option is available to you due to your §YLustful§! and §YCynical§! nature and your high §YIntrigue§!\n.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你的§Y色欲§!和§Y愤世嫉俗§!特质以及你高超的§Y密谋§!\n。

original: Is a threat
translation: 是个威胁

original: This character is a stutterer. It hampers their ability to communicate effectively with others.
translation: 此人口吃，严重影响与他人交流的能力。

original: I'm going to be the bestest ruler ever when I grow up!
translation: 等我长大了，我会成为最最出色的统治者！

original: Council members can join factions freely\n
translation: 内阁成员可以自由加入派系\n

original: Council members may only join factions when the Council is §RDiscontent§!\nNomad and tribal Council members can always join factions
translation: 内阁成员只有当处于§R不满§!状态时才能加入派系\n游牧和部落政体的内阁成员随时可以加入派系

original: §RThe Council recently rejected a crown law change. You can attempt to make a crown law change again at $DATE$§!
translation: §R内阁最近拒绝了关于王权法的改革。下次提议改革的时间为 $DATE$§!

original: Allow Matrilineal Marriage\n
translation: 允许入赘婚姻\n

original: Disallow Matrilineal Marriage\n
translation: 不允许入赘婚姻\n

original: $TITLE$ is being created
translation: $TITLE$已被创建

original: Form a Non-Aggression Pact between §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! and §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!与§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!签订互不侵犯条约。

original: If your dynastic bonds are close enough, you can offer a Non-Aggression Pact to another character.
translation: 如果你们的家族之间的关系足够密切，你就可以与其提议互不侵犯协议。

original: \nI offer to form a Non-Aggression Pact with you.
translation: 我提议与你签订互不侵犯条约。

original: \nLet us form a Non-Aggression Pact.
translation: 我们来签订互不侵犯协议吧。

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! can form a Non-Aggression Pact with §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!可以和§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!签订互不侵犯条约

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! has not recently rejected to form a Non-Aggression Pact with §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!最近没有拒绝与§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!签订互不侵犯协议

original: I, [From.GetBestName], accept your proposal for a Non-Aggression Pact!
translation: 我，[From.GetBestName]，接受你关于互不侵犯条约的建议！

original: I, [From.GetBestName], unfortunately have to decline your proposal for a Non-Aggression Pact!
translation: 我，[From.GetBestName]，很遗憾不得不拒绝你关于互不侵犯条约的建议！

original: A wise choice.
translation: 明智的选择。

original: What is the [GetFromRootInsult] planning?
translation: [GetFromRootInsult]在计划什么？

original: $COUNCILOR$ has decided to institute the $LAW$ Law in $TITLE$
translation: $COUNCILOR$决定在$TITLE$制定$LAW$法

original: Vote as favor owner on law change while returning favor
translation: 作为人情债主在法律修改上投票，并还清人情

original: Councilor initiating law change in liege's realm by using favor
translation: 内阁成员利用人情在领主境内发起了法律修改

original: By calling in a Favor $COUNCILOR|Y$ has forced you to start a vote on the $LAW|Y$ Law in $TITLE|Y$.
translation: 因为运用人情，$COUNCILOR|Y$强迫你对$TITLE|Y$内的$LAW|Y$法执行投票。

original: When alliance is broken
translation: 当联盟破裂时

original: The alliance between $CHAR$ and $ALLY$ has broken down
translation: $CHAR$与$ALLY$之间的联盟已经荡然无存

original: $CHARACTER|Y$ has voted $VOTE$ $LAW|Y$ due to $REQUESTOR$ requesting support.
translation: 由于$REQUESTOR$请求支持，$CHARACTER|Y$对$LAW|Y$投了$VOTE$

original: Vote as requestor requesting support on law change
translation: 作为请求者在法律修改上投票并请求支持

original: Conclave
translation: 御前会议

original: Undecided
translation: 未决定的

original: Army size with allies is less than $VAL|Y%$ of that of $OTHER|Y$ with allies.
translation: 加上盟国的军队规模少于$OTHER|Y$与其盟国的$VAL|Y%$

original: Army size with allies is at least $VAL|Y%$ of that of $OTHER|Y$ with allies.
translation: 加上盟国的军队规模至少有$OTHER|Y$与其盟国的$VAL|Y%$

original: Force acceptance of an Invite to Court proposal
translation: 强制同意邀入宫廷的提案

original: Force acceptance of a Call to Arms
translation: 强迫同意战争召唤

original: Force acceptance of an Ask to Embargo proposal
translation: 强迫同意要求禁运的提案

original: Force someone to join factions you lead
translation: 强迫某人加入你领导的派系

original: Force your liege to give you a Council position
translation: 强迫你的领主授予你内阁席位

original: Prevent or force a Realm Peace from your liege
translation: 阻止或强迫你的领主实行全境和平

original: Call in Council Support
translation: 请求内阁支持
